title: Better Man-- Happy 46th Birthday, Jim Caviezel
author: 李丹
comment: Jim Vaviezel is by far one of the sexiest man I have ever seen! So goodlooking. His eyes and smile are mesmerizing! His wife is so lucky, she can see that everyday.
Nice video. He's such a devout prolife Catholic Christian, yet he succeeds in Hollywood. Hopefully he's rubbing off on a few people.
He will always be the better man.
Loved him in Count of Monte Cristo and ofcourse The Passion :)
such a sweet song and tribute ....to a sweet Man...nice job on clips, thank you
description:
Jim Caviezel生日视频，by丹丹
转载请注明出处
